Vision.

Experience.

Ezra Bayraktar founded Bayraktar Consultants to take advantage of the tremendous growth opportunities in infrastructure sector in the Middle East. Born and raised in Turkey, educated in the US, Ezra Bayraktar has set-up, operated, and managed business’ here for others and decided, like all persons of vision and drive, to make use of that business experience to recently form Bayraktar Consultant.

  • 10 years experience consulting

  • International contact network
